title: The Regulation No
clause_text: The Regulation No. *10.1.1, 10.3.1, 10.3.2, 10.3.4, (1) (--), (2) (--) shall cease to operate on 1st Jan, 2022 or as decided by the Government from time to time and thereafter provisions of these regulations shall apply.
section: (2) 10.14.3 Development of land Notified for Acquisition

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
